# allTouches

**Instance Property**

All touches associated with the event.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var allTouches: Set<UITouch>? { get }
```

## Return Value

A set of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITouch] objects representing all touches associated with the event.

## Discussion

If the touches of the event originate in different views and windows, the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITouch] objects obtained from this method will be associated with different responder objects.

## Getting the touches for an event

- **touches(for:)**: Returns the touch objects from the event that belong to the specified given view.
- **touches(for:)**: Returns the touch objects from the event that belong to the specified window.
- **coalescedTouches(for:)**: Returns all of the touches associated with the specified main touch.
- **predictedTouches(for:)**: Returns an array of touches that are predicted to occur for the specified touch.
